biotools.summary:
bioinformatics plugins toward genomics-assisted breeding.

Genotyping and genomic selection plugins for Ion Torrent NGS platform.

version: 1.01 (March 12 2020 update).

IonBreeders: automated bioinformatics plugins toward genomics-assisted breeding.

The National Agriculture and Food Research Organization (hereinafter referred to as NARO) does not guarantee that defects, errors or malfunction will not occur with respect to IonBreeders.
